field_scenario_answer.value: Sector is an open source CMS Drupal distribution - made here in New Zealand and supported locally by Sparks Interactive.

field_scenario_answer_feedback.value: This is the right answer - we are not here to conquer the world, we are here to help local businesses and public entities deliver their websites and online services. Fast and efficient, just like New Zealanders.
